spec.description: High-level health across all stacks and services

spec.expr: sum by (stack) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack=~"$stack", success="false"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (stack) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack=~"$stack"}[$__rate_interval])) * 100

sum by (stack) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack=~"$stack", success="false"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (stack) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack=~"$stack"}[$__rate_interval])) * 100

topk(10, sum by (service, stack) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack=~"$stack", success="false"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (service, stack) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack=~"$stack"}[$__rate_interval])) * 100)
topk(10, avg by (service, stack) (avg_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack=~"$stack"}[$__rate_interval])))
topk(10, sum by (service, stack) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack=~"$stack"}[$__interval])) / (vector($__interval_ms) / 1000))
level:ERROR error_source:* environment:$environment | sort by (_time desc) | limit 100
(action:deployment_start OR action:deployment_complete) environment:$environment | sort by (_time desc) | limit 100
level:ERROR error_source:* environment:$environment | stats count() as total

spec.title: Platform Overview
